title: Which club is bigger, Leeds United or Aston Villa? - Quora

response.answer_text: In most terms, it’s Aston Villa. They have the larger trophy haul, the better average performances in the top flight, the better history in Europe and the bigger stadium & fan-base. Leeds come out on top only for having been champions last (1991–92), whereas Villa won the last major trophy, the 1996 League Cup, against Leeds (3 - 0).
